name: Karate Toad Tower Defense
description:
A game where you play as a toad defending his home from the enemy spiders coming to take over! Place towers to help you take on waves of different enemies! Make sure not a single one gets into your tower!... Or at least don't let 30 of them in!

----- GAME INSTRUCTIONS -----

Controls:

Forward- W

Backward - S

Left - A

Right - D

Sprint - L-Shift

Jump - Spacebar

Attack - L-Click

Place Tower - E [Must be by Tower Node]

Turrets:

Turret - Medium Speed; Medium Power; Medium Range

Sniper - Slow Speed; High Power; Long Range

Frost Machine - High Speed; Low Power; Short Range

Enemies:

Normal Spider - Regular Speed, Regular Health

Speedy Spider - Fast Speed, Small Health

Tank Spider - Slow Speed, Super Large Health

Web Spider* - Regular Speed, Regular Health; Can walk on the purple platform

**Web Spiders are still in-development

----- WARNINGS -----

Known Issues:

  • Frog's Left-Right walking animations do not work for long if at all.
  • Sprinting animation continues even after stopping if you hold Shift; let go of it and the Frog will stop.
  • If you press Pause while selecting a Turret then hit Continue, the Turret Select screen still shows up; go back into Turret Selection and click Exit.
  • Some later rounds bug out and start slightly earlier than anticipated.
  • Sometimes the Frog continues moving in a certain direction; press the direction again and the Frog will stop moving there.
  • You can hold L-Click to spam attack; this does not work on Tank Spiders.
  • Web Spiders cannot be damaged by Turrets. Because of this Web Spiders are only available in the last round <19>.
  • The Win Screen appears too soon in the last round.
